item.title: ‘After the Hunt’ Review: Julia Roberts Is in Brittle Command Even if Luca Guadagnino Isn’t in a #MeToo Drama That Mistakes Abrasive for Provocative
item.description: Ayo Edebiri, Andrew Garfield, Michael Stuhlbarg and Chloë Sevigny also star in this psychological thriller about a sexual assault accusation that tears through the Yale philosophy department.

item.title: Luca Guadagnino Reveals Why He Used Woody Allen-Style Credits for #MeToo Film ’After the Hunt’
item.description: The Italian auteur talked about his Amazon MGM Studios film during a Venice Film Festival press conference where he was joined by stars Julia Roberts, Ayo Edebiri, Andrew Garfield and Chloë Sevigny.

item.title: NY Film Festival Sets ‘After the Hunt’ as Opening Night Movie
item.description: The Luca Guadagnino-directed title from Amazon MGM Studios stars Julia Roberts, Ayo Edebiri and Andrew Garfield and will receive its North American premiere at the Manhattan event.
